des: "This is a great dip for veggies and chips. The distinctive flavors of Gorgonzola cheese and dill are blended into a smooth party favorite."
ins: In a food processor, place low-fat mayonnaise, low-fat sour cream, Gorgonzola cheese, dill, garlic, salt and pepper. Blend until smooth. Sprinkle gelatin into mixture. Allow it to soften for approximately 5 minutes. Blend to mix in gelatin. Cover and chill in the refrigerator until serving.
